summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the Master Plan approved by Ordinance 121502 for the development of wetlands and wildlife habitat and an athletic field complex at Magnuson Park; expressing support for the proposed phase 2 wetlands, natural areas and athletic fields; requesting additional information from the Department of Parks and Recreation; and reaffirming conditions in Ordinance 121502 for the use of external funding for wetlands, natural area and athletic fields at Magnuson Park.
